```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
```

Inputs & preprocessing

We have 4 files to open in this case. We've already decided which columns we are dropping, and hence we only read select number of columns.

```{r inputs, echo=FALSE}
coding_muts <- fread('CosmicCodingMuts.vcf')
mutant_export <- read.table('CosmicMutantExport.tsv', sep = '\t', header = TRUE)
non_coding_var <- fread("CosmicNonCodingVariants.vcf")
res_mut <- read.table('CosmicResistanceMutations.tsv', sep = '\t', header = TRUE)
```

Preprocessing

We shall drop the columns that are not necessary from each df

```{r preprocessing, echo=FALSE}
select(mutant_export, -c(Accession.Number, Gene.CDS.length, HGNC.ID, Sample.name, ID_sample, ID_tumour, Pubmed_PMID, ID_STUDY))
```
